name: NirankariBhaktiSangeet
0:
”Alexa, open bhakti sangeet”
”Alexa, ask bhakti sangeet for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start bhakti sangeet”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bhakti sangeet
des:
Listen to the latest podcasts from Nirankari Voice Divine Bhakti Sangeet. 
You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. 
When listening to Voice Divine Bhakti Sangeet you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Sant Nirankari Mission.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
